video_identification.title: Mapping My Return - APWA's discussion with Salman H. Abu-Sitta

extracted_metadata.title: Mapping My Return - APWA's discussion with Salman H. Abu-Sitta
extracted_metadata.description: This last Sunday, APWA had the privilege of hosting a discussion with Palestinian researcher Salman H. Abu-Sitta. In this session, we delved into his memoir, "Mapping My Return," exploring his personal journey and the broader historical context of Palestine. Join us as Abu-Sitta shares his insights, experiences, and the meticulous work behind his memoir. This conversation offers perspective on the Palestinian narrative and is a must-watch to understand what's going on today.
